reviews.review:
I voti vanno da 1 a 10, dove più il voto è alto più è positivo e sono dati a gioco completato.  Nel voto viene tenuto conto il periodo in cui il gioco è stato lanciato sul mercato.

-	Grafica 8
-	Sonoro 7
-	Storia 7
-	Giocabilità 7
-	Longevità 6

Giudizio finale:
Una pietra miliare degli FPS e il primo capitolo di una bellissima saga. Se siete amanti del gene va assolutamente giocato!

Ricordo a tutti che il giudizio, come il gusto è sempre molto personale.
Лучшая игра, Валве умеют делать интересные сюжеты.
легенда
Juego Majestuoso, una jugabilidad increible y una historia muy bien lograda, simplemente inolvidable.
e

Half Life muazzam bir oyun. Bölüm tasarımı harika 98 yapımı bir oyun için.
Ki hala daha iyi açın black mesa ya bakın.

Bu oyun olmasaydı CS GO , Valorant PUBG Rainbow Apex Legends gibi oyunların olma ihtimali çok düşük olurdu.

Su oyun gibi oyun piyasada çok az var arkadaş . Her taraf online coop açık dünya oyunu dolmuş !

Artılar :
+Hikaye arkaplanı
+Bölüm tasarımları enfes
+Düşman çeşitliliği yeterli
+Oyun süresi ideal 
+Online modu harika unutulamaz
+Yapay zeka hala daha iyi 
+Tüm hikaye gidişatının 5-6 saat yani sizin oyun süreniz kadar olması yani zaman atlaması falan yok hiç.

Eksiler ( Maalesef )
-Ben demiyorum ama bazıları 98 de çıkmış bu oyunun hikaye anlatımını eleştiriyor (!) Haklılar ama oyun 98 yapımı arkadaş !
-Az müzik var
-Vuruş hissi günümüze göre zayıf ( Pompalı iyi )
-Half Life 3 yok

Gördüğünüz gibi aslına oyunun eksisi yok oyuna puanım 9.4/10

Black mesa oynamanızı tavsiye ederim.
Nostaljinin dorukları, taşağına kurban olayım half life 3
1 efsanenin başlangıcı
MY. ASS. IS. HEAVY.

Really fun game, i love the story and the environments (being in underground science corridors and outside in desert ruins). The combat is alot of fun, especially when you run into soldiers and aliens at the same time, oh boy. The movement at first is kinda weird to get used to, I often feel like my feet are sliding on butter, The music in this game is also really wicked and adds atmosphere to the world. My only complaint are the rare but still seen glitches, like i've been stuck in doors or elevators before, and thats sometimes killed me, either from an enemey or taking damage in the object. Otherwise this game is pretty dope.
I love this game so far

Сама по себе игра оху... офигенная, для того времени игра была просто идеальной, сейчас она тоже ничего, но если ты в неё играешь в первый раз в наше то время, то ты жопу сломаешь пока её пройдёшь. Но в принципе пострадать в некоторых моментах нестрашно для общего геймплея. Обстановка постоянно меняется, возникают новые механики, и игра никогда не заставит тебя заскучать. Так что всем рекомендую пройти хотя бы для общего развития.

Textbook definition of a masterpiece.

Great story with lots of in-game lore
Satisfying gunplay with a large arsenal of unique weapons
Enemies are more than just bullet sponges
Environments are interesting and tightly designed
Music, when it kicks in, is great and ambient sounds don't get tiring even after an entire playthrough

The only problem I have is that the collision is buggy sometimes

There is no excuse not to play this game, it's dirt-cheap during Steam sales and can run on a potato from the last 10 years
Very good

This game has been considered a classic time and time again, so let me tell you whether the game is worth it. It was a somewhat interesting game and I have yet to complete it to show my true approval, but I believe this game is worth it. Fun game to play, not the best, but definitely something to enjoy in-between the real games out there.

A good ol' classic.
I've usually stuck to Portal and such, but I've recently started playing the Half Life series to see if they're just as good as I've been told.
And let me tell you: They're absolutely correct.
This game has aged perfectly to me. Sure, the graphics are super 90's 3D, but I love it anyways.
Although stuck in a single facility, the diverse locations that make up Black Mesa make this thing just as expansive as it's sequel.
11/10.

Here you will see why I love Half-Life, but in my review you will read about why I gave it a negative review due to some problems.

I love Half-Life I love the story behind Gordon Freeman and the G Man appearing in certain places at certain times throughout the singleplayer campaign levels.

I love the take on aliens having headcrabs that attach themselves to humans and take control of their bodies nerve system to make them move and be "zombies" it is a refreshing take on zombies, without actually being zombies in what we have come to know as zombies since George A. Romero's zombie takes in movies from the 1960's.

Now I remember back in 2005 when I first played Half-Life it had DirectX 8 support and now with VALVe pushing Linux support and removing DirectX 8 from the Gold Source engine video games adding OpenGL support to the Gold Source engine video games I keep getting OpenGL errors every now and then and some freezing issues, which I do not remember ever happening with DirectX 8.

Here is a screenshot of one of the few OpenGL errors I experience here and there. Followed by freezing of the video games that use OpenGL, before crashing.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/887417416764768257/926930307003850792/OpenGL_errors_on_video_games_that_use_OpenGL_on_Windows.png

There is also some water texture seams that seem to be see through in the Residue Processing campaign level.

VALVe please add DirectX 8 support or at least a more up to date version of DirectX 9 support which supports 64-bit, which is DirectX 9.0C I believe?

Otherwise I cannot give Half-Life a positive review due to these technical issues, which I cannot seem to fix even if I reinstall Windows or Half-Life.

Also VALVe please release Half-Life, with Half-Life: Source, and Half-Life: Deathmatch Source for sale on gog.com. You have said with the Source 2 engine that video game developers developing video games on the Source 2 engine can release the video games that they develop for sale outside of Steam, without needing Steam as long as the video games are also released for sale on Steam.
